description: Three people are arrested after police find workers in a secret room hidden behind piles of clothes.
title: Spanish police rescue 21 'exploited' migrant workers from warehouse
title_page: Spanish police rescue 21 'exploited' migrant workers from warehouse - BBC News
maintext: Four of them jumped an outer fence while others locked themselves in the warehouse. When officers gained entry they found eight workers had been placed inside a "den" that was hidden behind heavy trolleys full of clothing.
